Intros are boring. Yada yada yada, hi I'm Xannari, let's move on.

Getting right into it, the object of the game is to go about talking to others casually... but with a twist!

Are you a poet? If not, that's fine! Come on anyway!

The conversations should be casual, regular, but... you have to talk in rhymes. Sound challenging enough?

Those good at vocabulary would say no... I'm looking at you, Vexx... Are you a Yoshi? I love Yoshis. You're like Tim; A big, soft Yoshi that we all love.

Silliness aside, why don't I start? 

You there! A fine look you have today. 

A personal inquiry, I request a brief delay;

Or shall you continue on your way?

...I could treat you to a game of Croquet.

Okay?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-21T16:15:27Z" title="03/21/2015 04:15  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 21, 2015</time> by Xannari Ferrows**

A gracious offer, but Croquet isn't my thing...

But then again, neither can I sing.

Normally I'd engage you in conversation,

but right now I'm on my way to deliver a vocation.

Perhaps some other time?

(This was just another excuse to make one last rhyme!)

Are you in a hurry? Don't mind me.

Apologies for the delay, truly.

I await your next arrival, here,

Or until I grow wear.

I really must be going, it's true,

but before I leave I say to you:

I think that this rhyming conversation

will go on much longer than my inclination!

So sad to part ways oh so soon.

Nevertheless, I bid good afternoon.

To record Ninja Gaiden tonight...

Is proving harder than it sounded, alright.

This thread lay in gentle sleep,

"The rhymes stopped!" The people weeped.

I awaken this thread from its dormancy,

good thing it's too soon to be necromancy!

I must agree

Wholeheartedly.

I'd forgotten this

To the abyss

You're back here,

But the others where?

Missing this clear,

Without a care.

A care I have

but not for this:

I'm far above

such sillyness.

I need to go to bed, but I'm here on the forum

All of your pretty sig's fill my page with such decorum

Third-shift sucks, I'll be sleeping until sunset

Goodnight, tired now, of dreams I feel the onset.

I await your return

If you must adjourn.

Goodbye for right now,

See you soon. Ciao!

I really ought to do something productive

But playing KSP is so seductive

I'll do my project another day

It's much more fun to play

Hello and goodbye, we come and go,

We come back again to follow the flow.

Incriminates of posts, small but surly... 

But perhaps this one was made too early.
